      • unregisterBroadcastReceiver

      • isV1ConnectionSPP

        public static boolean isV1ConnectionSPP(BluetoothDevice device)
        Helper method that checks if the BluetoothDevice is a V1Connection (SPP). The method simple extracts the name device and checks if it starts with SPP_NAME_SEARCH_PREFIX
        Parameters:
        device - The BluetoothDevice to check.
        Returns:
        True if the device's name starts with SPP_NAME_SEARCH_PREFIX otherwise, false.

      • getSocket

        public BluetoothSocket getSocket()
        Deprecated. DO NOT USE. THIS METHOD WILL BE REMOVED IN THE NEXT API RELEASE.
        Returns the BluetoothSocket for in-out communication with the V1 connection.
        Specified by:
        getSocket in class VR_BluetoothWrapper
        Returns:
        The BluetoothSocket of the current Bluetooth connection, if available, otherwise, null.
